about_the_game:
This free patch adds 18+ content to Rain and the Wold, including:

  • Six sex scenes between two adult characters (genitals are censored by pixels)
  • Six new CGs
  • About 15,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, Rain and the Wolf, to download.

content_descriptors.notes:
This patch adds several explicit sex scenes between two adult characters into the game. While three of the scenes are explicitly consensual, two of the scenes are non-consensual, though these can be toggled off in the options if you do not want to encounter them while reading.

All of the explicit art in this story has pixel censoring of the genitals, so they cannot be seen clearly.

detailed_description:
This free patch adds 18+ content to Rain and the Wold, including:

  • Six sex scenes between two adult characters (genitals are censored by pixels)
  • Six new CGs
  • About 15,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, Rain and the Wolf, to download.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

name: Rain and the Wolf Adult Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output
